channel.title: Do you think it will happen? Support
channel.description:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tWjLvVWOLUU Watch the vid, give some feedback
I doubt jagex would do this because I don't think they felt the same way the players did, and I think it would have to do something with money hungry people. That's all that I've heard.

item.title: Do you think it will happen? Support
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Aren’t these guys having a riot about 2006 on like September 6th

Read full topic

item.title: Do you think it will happen? Support
item.dc:creator: @mihalich mihalich
item.description:
@mihalich wrote:

[quote=“xen0n, post:8, topic:451764”][quote author=mihalich link=topic=554652.msg4062186#msg4062186 date=1343520510]
Never going to happen and already posted at least once. They want to move forward with the game not backwards.
[/quote]

Are they really moving backwards when they allow players to login to a seperate server to play an older revision.

They would still have their current revision and updates coming in for the revision as well I’m sure.[/quote]
Yes actually they are.

Read full topic
item.source: Do you think it will happen? Support

item.title: Do you think it will happen? Support
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

Never going to happen and already posted at least once. They want to move forward with the game not backwards.
[/quote]

Are they really moving backwards when they allow players to login to a seperate server to play an older revision.

They would still have their current revision and updates coming in for the revision as well I’m sure.[/quote]
Yes, because they’d be splitting the playerbase in half
